text:
="preserve">Nichola Thorp (born 30 September 1988/1989), also known as Nicola Sian, is an English actress. She is known for her portrayal of Nicola Rubinstein in long-running ITV soap opera, "Coronation Street", from 2017 to 2019.
Thorp was born and raised in Blackpool, the town of Lancashire, England.
